availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Administrative body of the state of California. Capital at Sacramento, California. Governor(s): John B. Weller (1858-1860), Milton Latham (1860), John G. Downey (1860-1862), Leland Standford (1862-1863), and Frederick Low (1863-1867).

ab.bibl:
"Previous Capitals of California." California History Section, California State Library, Sacramento, CA, 2020. https://www.library.ca.gov/california-history/previous-ca-capitals/.
"Former California Governors." National Governors Association, 2021. https://www.nga.org/former-governors/california/.
